summary: Fixed banner-name inconsistency across pages. Added the missing Google Fonts link for 'Great Vibes' font to skills.html, contact.html, and projects.html. Also standardized the icon path to 'Bright Mohlala/Personal Logo.jpg' on these pages. Now all pages have consistent banner-name styling with the Great Vibes font and consistent icon references.
current_status: Banner-name inconsistency fixed. All pages now have the Great Vibes font link and consistent icon paths, ensuring the banner-name displays uniformly across the entire website.
